Unless stated otherwise, this information is valid both for Polaris Docker images (and Kubernetes deployments) as well as for Polaris binary distributions. ğŸ“ Note For Production tips and best practices, refer to Configuring Polaris for Production. First off, Polaris server runs on Quarkus, and uses its configuration mechanisms. Read Quarkus configuration guide to get familiar with the basics. Quarkus aggregates configuration properties from multiple sources, applying them in a specific order of precedence.
